document.full_text: bailed-out insurer american international group  is working hard to invest cash it set aside for a failed deal to buy back assets from the federal reserve, chief executive bob benmosche said on tuesday.
document.title: aig working on investing cash, may bid on bonds
lines_and_colors: bailed-out insurer american international group  is working hard to invest cash it set aside for a failed deal to buy back assets from the federal reserve, chief executive bob benmosche said on tuesday.
